mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, goods_id, goods_detail_id, goods_name, goods_image, goods_price, specs, quantity, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsDetailId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsPrice}, #{specs}, #{quantity}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND goods_id = #{goodsId} AND specs = #{specs}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, specs = #{specs}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
